content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find the apartment to your liking. Let's discuss the rental price. What is your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am willing to rent the apartment for 600 Euro per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but that's quite low for an apartment of this quality in the city center. Can you offer more?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that it is a good apartment, but I am a student and I am on a budget. I can increase my offer to 650 Euro per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: 650 Euro is still below market value. I'm sure you'll agree that a central location with all amenities nearby is worth more. Can you go higher?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: You are right, the location is great. I will increase my offer to 700 Euro per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: 700 Euro is more like it, but I still think it could be higher. This is a very sought-after area. Can you make it an even 750 Euro? That would be a fair deal for both of us.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 750 Euro per month!
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Excellent! I'm glad we could reach an agreement. The apartment will be yours for 750 Euro per month. Is there anything else I can assist you with?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
